physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. It is pentagonal shape, with a triangular top and square bottom. The chakla is decorated with stylized flowers, elephants, cows, and the Hindu god Ganesha. There is a sewn-on inscription in the center of the chakla.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) birds (motifs) deities depictions (visual works) beadwork (visual works)
